## ContentDivinator.words() method

Extract words from the following text.

If special symbols are found, they will be stripped off.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
words(text: string): WordUsageMapType;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| text      | string |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

[WordUsageMapType](./content-divinator.wordusagemaptype.md)
